verses.text:
O, Comfort to the deary! O, Joy to the oppressed!
"Come unto Me, ye weary, And I will give you rest."
O, come with all your weakness, Come with your load of woe;
And learn of him with meekness All righteousness to know.

Enslaved of foolish error, Worn out by doubt and pain,
Reapers of doubt and terror, Come, cast away your chains!
Repentance the superstition And turn from vain tradition
To His redeeming word.
